notes: This object represents notes on the below schema

multimedia: This will be null if it is not a media type link
I am also not sure whether this is a thing or not. I am thinking an audio link that plays the audio in the webpage.

name: string|Human readable name of the scrape
url: string|Url of the site being scraped
site_name: string|Name of the site if included in a meta tag

images.url: string|Fully qualified URL of the image source

size.amount: integer|Number value of the size of the image

links.url: string|Fully qualified URL of the image source
links.external: boolean|Flag to denote whether this is a different domain or not
links.scrape: $reference|Should be a non-nested reference to another scrape, if one exists

multimedia.type: string|Whether it is an image/video/audio/etc media
multimedia.format: string|Format type of the media i.e. jpg/mp3/etc

links.occurrences: integer|Number of times this link URL has occurred on this scrape
